name: Fahrenheit 100.4
description:
A short (5-10 min) comedy visual novel that I made as a proof of concept/to try out RenPy. It is about a couple of young adults visiting a friend who's feeling under the weather. It has... jokes.

There is no audio. There are no choices. (oopz)

Any allusions to real world illnesses (other than the ones I named in the game :P) are completely coincidental. Yes that means this game was made before coronavirus.

All art is MINE!!! I made it lol

Tell me if you like my characters uwu. I think I want to reuse their models for a longer VN.
